title: A Matter of commonsense, mainly
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, L.J. Connolly and John Cooper
brief_description: Increasing numbers of people go boating and boating accidents are happening in increasing numbers. A variety of mariners, including some real old salts, tell of safety in different kinds of small craft, and relate anecdotes from their own experiences. Written and directed by John Cooper.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, L.J. Connolly and John Cooper
